content: cotton facial scrubbies are perfect for cleansing and gently exfoliating the skin these scrubbies are made from 100% cotton yarn and are machine washable for convenience these cleansing pads also work well in the kitchen - use them to scrub dishes clean up small spills or a number of other things around the house kids love using these as washcloths too they re the perfect size for little hands scrubbies measure approximately 3 1/4 inches in diameter
